attributes.action: not to penalise the vast majority of sensible drinkers by setting minimum drink prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: setting minimum prices for the sale of alcohol i.e raising prices. will punish the vast majority of people who enjoy a drink after a days work and who drink sensibly.  why cant the answer be for the police to apply the laws already there, punish those who break these laws. Dont go for a shot gun approach that punishes everyone

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "not to penalise the vast majority of sensible drinkers by setting minimum drink prices."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21793


Prime Minister's Office
